title: MD
biography: Dr. P. Raghu Ram is a highly distinguished surgical oncologist and a prominent advocate for breast health in India. He is the Founding Director of the KIMS-USHALAKSHMI Centre for Breast Diseases and established the Ushalakshmi Breast Cancer Foundation. He served as the President of the Association of Surgeons of India (2020) and is a recipient of the Padma Shri and OBE for his transformative work in breast cancer awareness and early detection.
aiSummary: P. Raghu Ram is a Elite-tier (top 1%) surgical oncology specialist with an H-index of 110 at KIMS Hospitals, Hyderabad (Director & Consultant Surgeon). Known for pioneered Pink Ribbon Campaign in India, Pink Connexion Newsletter and performed 2,000+ verified procedures and impacted an estimated 10,000 lives. Has been published in JAMA oncology, JAMA neurology, Lecture notes in computer science and recipient of the undefined (undefined). Based in Hyderabad, Telangana, India.
education: FRCS from all four Royal Colleges in the British Isles
